register.title: Join the endeavor!
register.titleSubLine: If you don't have an account yet, create one now!
register.registrationCodeDescription: In order to register, you need a code provided by the admin / DM!

login.title: Welcome back, adventurer
login.titleSubLine: You need your passphrase to start playing!

changeAdminState.titleDemote: Demoting user from his administrator privileges
changeAdminState.bodyPromote: You are about to grant administrator rights to {{user}}. This user will be able to issue One Time Tokens, manage administrator rights of other users, block users or even delete them.
changeAdminState.bodyDemote: You are about to remove administrator privileges from {{user}}. The user will still be able to user the software as intended, but will be missing any necessary rights to manage e.g. users.

changeBlockState.bodyBlock: You are about to block {{user}}. The user will not be able to log into this appliation anymore until the block has been removed.
changeBlockState.bodyUnblock: You are about to unblock {{user}}. After this operation, the user will be able to log into the application again and use its functionality again.
